backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all types (TradeEntry, UserProfile, PerformanceGoals, CalendarDayPerformance, FTMOAnalytics, etc.) and integrating Storage, AccessControl, and Authorization mixins for the trading journal backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features updating the pre-trade checklist to four items (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG) in AddTradeDialog, EditTradeDialog, and TradesList components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App.tsx, hooks, pages, and components with details about authentication, trade management, performance analytics, and the updated four-item checklist.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Private Trading Journal Web App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup modal, theme provider, toast notifications, and loading states with Header/Footer layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AchievementBadge: Component displaying achievement badges with icons (Trophy, Target, Star) based on status (targetReached, goalAchieved, milestone) with configurable sizes and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/AddTradeDialog.t: Dialog component for adding new trade entries with form inputs for trade details (asset, direction, prices, position size), image uploads (before/after), tag management, and a pre-trade checklist with risk metrics calculations.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Calendar component displaying monthly trade performance with color-coded days (profit/loss/neutral), clickable day details showing trades and metrics, and navigation controls with refresh functionality.
Dialog component for editing existing trade entries, pre-populating form fields with trade data and supporting updates to all trade properties including images, tags, and checklist items.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/FTMOAnalytics.ts: Analytics dashboard component displaying FTMO challenge compliance metrics including max daily loss/profit, profit target progress, consistency rate, average risk percentage, and risk/reward ratios with color-coded compliance indicators.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding, authentication controls (login/logout via Internet Identity), user profile dropdown showing account balance, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and navigation functionality.
Displays key trading metrics in a card grid including total P&L, win rate, average risk percentage, risk-reward ratio, and best/worst trades with color-coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceChart: Renders interactive charts using Recharts to visualize cumulative P&L, equity curve, monthly profit/loss breakdown, and win/loss distribution across trades.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceGoals: Displays progress toward weekly and monthly profit targets and drawdown limits with progress bars, status indicators, and achievement badges.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceSumma: Shows aggregate performance statistics including total P&L, cumulative return, win rate, and weekly/monthly performance charts with FTMO analytics integration.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditDialo: Modal dialog for editing user profile settings including name, account balance, currency selection, and performance goals (monthly/weekly targets and drawdown limits).
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup, collecting name, account balance, currency selection, and optional performance goals (monthly profit, weekly target, max drawdown). Prevents dismissal until profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/TradesList.tsx: Displays a filterable table of trade entries with edit/delete actions, detailed trade view dialog, and CSV export functionality. Includes tag filtering, profit/loss color coding, and image viewing capabilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for delegation and idle behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profile management, trade CRUD operations, performance metrics, tags, and calendar data with optimistic updates and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, sidebar, and applying base styles with font features.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions including className merging (cn), currency formatting with symbol lookup for 34+ currencies, and compact number formatting for calendar displays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component that displays trading metrics, performance charts, trades list, calendar view, and FTMO analytics using tabs; includes logic to calculate FTMO compliance metrics from trade data.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Homepage component that shows a landing page for unauthenticated users and a summary dashboard for authenticated users, displaying recent trades, performance metrics, goals progress, and achievement badges.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: TypeScript type definitions mirroring backend structures for trade entries, user profiles, performance goals, calendar data, FTMO analytics, and achievement badges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, animations, and font families for the application's design system.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting completed features for updating pre-trade checklist to four items (Bias, OBS, LQS, FVG) across AddTradeDialog, EditTradeDialog, and TradesList components.
